description: This Dart source file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages the state of notes in a Flutter application. It interacts with a database helper for CRUD operations and supports search functionality.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A provider class for managing notes state, supporting CRUD operations and search query updates.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the database matching the current search query and updates the local notes list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID from the database and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string and loads notes matching the new query.
